name: Ninja SEO Links
author: Hyliacom

sections.installation:
FROM YOUR WORDPRESS DASHBOARD

Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
Search for ‘Ninja SEO Links’
Activate Ninja SEO Links from your Plugins page.

Download Ninja SEO Links.
Upload the Ninja SEO Links directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
Activate Ninja SEO Links from your Plugins page.
sections.description: With Ninja SEO Links you can easily add a title, decide if the link is “follow” or “no follow” or if you want it to open in “blank”, “parent”, “self” or “top”. With this plugin you also have access to a list from where you can manage the links already created, you can easily consult how many times it has been opened each one.

description: With Ninja SEO Links you can easily add a title, decide if the link is “follow” or “no follow” or if you want it to open in “blank”, “parent”, “self” or “top”. With this plugin you also have access to a list from where you can manage the links already created, you can easily consult how many times it has been opened each one.
